Obito uses [[Fire Release: Phoenix Sage Fire Technique]] and Minato throws [[Flying Thunder God Kunai]] at the opponent. Kakashi then forms a [[Chidori]] and Obito activates his [[Sharingan]] and Minato teleports them to the opponent using [[Flying Thunder God Technique]]. Kakashi strikes the opponent with Chidori and Obito kicks the opponent, with Kakashi rushing and striking the opponent with Chidori yet again. Minato then teleports to the opponent. The three then strike the opponent, with Obito stabbing the opponent with a kunai, Minato slashing with a kunai and Kakashi slashing with a [[White Light Chakra Sabre]].
